title: League of Legends Port Forwarding
body:
Hi,

I am having a lot of issues lately with my NAT type. More than likely a modem issue. Although only PSN and League don't work. Everything else works a charm. Ive Port Forwarded PSN though my modem and now it works. Can someone from Riot please supply me with the ports I need to forward to assist my situation?

Much appreciated,

Thank you

replies.body:
Hey there,

You can find the list of ports that the game uses [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq8)

Hi SephirothSG,

Thank you very much for supplying that information. Sorry I didn't check that page first!
